overview: As General Manager, Platform at T3Media, Frank Cardello is responsible for developing strategic business relationships with industry partners. Prior to joining T3Media, Frank served as VP of Sales and Business Development for Ping Identity Corporation and Jabber, Inc. Before that, he was the CFO of HomeTouch.com, Inc. and Building Up Los Angeles, the nationâ€™s second largest Americorps National Service Project. Prior to business school, Frank served as a Lieutenant in the US Navy. He received his B.S. in economics and general engineering from the United States Naval Academy and his MBA from The Kellogg School at Northwestern University.

degrees.institution: The Kellogg School at Northwestern University
